display_long_description:
The Frenzy Virus has mutated, unleashing a new wave of chaos. You and your team must now confront hordes of "The Ridden" in Frenzy Extinction. Immerse yourself in a fast-paced, action-packed VR experience where survival hinges on your ability to adapt, upgrade, and overpower relentless enemies.
[media]
# Key Features:
**Intense Horde Survival Gameplay**

Engage in thrilling, physics-based combat against waves of mutated monsters. Each enemy is designed with unique abilities and behaviors, keeping you on your toes as you fight for survival.
[media]
**Upgrade and Customize**

Collect Necronium from defeated enemies to upgrade your gear, unlock new areas, and enhance your abilities with powerful perks. 
[media]
**Diverse and Immersive Maps**

Explore 10 maps, each with its own atmosphere and challenges. Survive in desolate cities, eerie forests, and more! 
[media]
**Epic Boss Battles**

Face off against formidable bosses throughout each map. These fights will test your skills and teamwork as you survive their special abilities. 
[media]
**Multiplayer Mayhem**

Team up with up to 3 friends in seamless co-op multiplayer. Strategize and cooperate to defeat the hordes, share loot, and defeat the boss to extract. 
[media]
**Progression and Customization**

Gather scrap, a permanent currency, to unlock new weapons and upgrades at your home base. Persistently enhance your character across play sessions, becoming stronger and more versatile with each run.

# Key Features:
**Intense Horde Survival Gameplay**

Engage in thrilling, physics-based combat against waves of mutated monsters. Each enemy is designed with unique abilities and behaviors, keeping you on your toes as you fight for survival.
![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982499_874210870844905_8266732701765703080_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=hWjAOorIidUQ7kNvwFp9e_P&_nc_oc=AdnyprhLH67G_EygsgYOiLi9jS9iVHNoWGlR5lzR9rh14i3b8ctfQRCmydDe4AWl02E&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=DyB1Z_iR7seLFxDZwlS-pA&oh=00_AfGicsHE_AznO950xRFmOm19Bc_jOVTQwxQfvx8BzqVIOw&oe=6810A189)
**Upgrade and Customize**

Collect Necronium from defeated enemies to upgrade your gear, unlock new areas, and enhance your abilities with powerful perks.

**Diverse and Immersive Maps**

Explore 10 maps, each with its own atmosphere and challenges. Survive in desolate cities, eerie forests, and more! 
![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982581_1223888319033072_3959488854512735737_n.mp4?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=2N0iWaXPNnkQ7kNvwFvvPD2&_nc_oc=AdlZbpIdpwt_mAdUE1sTJcPHIvjtqnmGFKjqZQHz_PAi0ePSjExvmITrVcRrhijlhUE&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=DyB1Z_iR7seLFxDZwlS-pA&oh=00_AfHgxJPE0GuiKuGlLoqy-0HpmyYKBA6Xub-cTlHNpaM30g&oe=6810AEDD)
**Epic Boss Battles**

Face off against formidable bosses throughout each map. These fights will test your skills and teamwork as you survive their special abilities. 
![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38974548_1040387177540093_112250259871580574_n.mp4?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=yps5wYWLZRcQ7kNvwHh0VT7&_nc_oc=AdlubnB5-AX3EGXh33-Hkm1YDpLLskWT4VDH-4kL6ggfEHHCkEE7chzYOHkoQaFg0GQ&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=DyB1Z_iR7seLFxDZwlS-pA&oh=00_AfGy1QotO6GFYUobIMefVo32nfaEZAcWHsXc1rVqHhxlfA&oe=68109C92)
**Multiplayer Mayhem**

Team up with up to 3 friends in seamless co-op multiplayer. Strategize and cooperate to defeat the hordes, share loot, and defeat the boss to extract. 
![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38974628_1432121104166417_7819473213702105902_n.mp4?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=lO4AAgfE76kQ7kNvwFnmH64&_nc_oc=AdnuxeVhdh5ieF1XEAfRJDYXyJXrikL2Zuel8jDn4pcXklpk7oUnSX71Am-RRbyFcdM&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=DyB1Z_iR7seLFxDZwlS-pA&oh=00_AfHIpLXUlNXW3Mb-sDWuImYrpfBp0AeFbFIkGjeZ72vmUg&oe=6810B6C2)
**Progression and Customization**

Gather scrap, a permanent currency, to unlock new weapons and upgrades at your home base. Persistently enhance your character across play sessions, becoming stronger and more versatile with each run.
